title: Counting Bugs
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 17 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile BR90L
description: Counting Bugs revels in the colorful world of creepy crawlies. The butterflies, caterpillars, ladybugs, and other friendly multi-legged insects in this book will excite students without scaring them. Each page invites readers to count a different number of bugs. The photographs are gorgeous and appealing, while the text is simple and well suited for the earliest of readers.
highFrequencyWords: bugs, five, four, many, one, seven, six, three, two
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Initial Consonants                : Discriminate initial consonant /s/ sound
grammar: Concept Words                : Recognize and use number words
